patthana17.26:1.1: Pītisahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca napītisahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:2.1: Sukhasahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca nasukhasahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:3.1: Upekkhāsahagataṃ kusalaṃ dhammaṃ paṭicca naupekkhāsahagato nakusalo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā … satta.
patthana17.26:4.1: Hetuyā ekavīsati, adhipatiyā ekavīsati …pe… avigate ekavīsati. (Vedanāttikasadisaṃ. Saṃkhittaṃ.)
